Package com.IGallinari.LastGame.service

Class TeamService

java.lang.Object
com.IGallinari.LastGame.service.TeamService
@Service public class TeamService extends Object
This service class provides methods to retrieve information about NBA teams, including team details, standings, last games, head-to-head statistics, and team comparisons.

    Description

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?>
    buildCompareTeamResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idTeam1, int idTeam2, int season)
    Builds a response containing a comparison of two NBA teams, including team statistics, last games, and head-to-head performance.
    StandingsResponse
    buildStandingsResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int season)
    Builds a response containing NBA team standings for a specific season, including information about wins, losses, and statistical averages.
    TeamDetailsResponse
    buildTeamDetailsResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idTeam, int season)
    Builds a response containing detailed information about an NBA team, including its statistics, players, and recent performance.
    TeamsResponse
    buildTeams(TokenRequest tokenRequest)
    Builds a response containing information about NBA teams, including their conferences, divisions, and whether they are marked as favorites by a user.

      public TeamService()

  • Method Details

    • buildTeams

      public TeamsResponse buildTeams(TokenRequest tokenRequest)
      Builds a response containing information about NBA teams, including their conferences, divisions, and whether they are marked as favorites by a user.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The token request containing the user's authentication token.
      Returns:
      A TeamsResponse object with team information.

    • buildTeamDetailsResponse

      public TeamDetailsResponse buildTeamDetailsResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idTeam, int season)
      Builds a response containing detailed information about an NBA team, including its statistics, players, and recent performance.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The token request containing the user's authentication token.
      idTeam - The unique identifier of the team.
      season - The season for which team details are requested.
      Returns:
      A TeamDetailsResponse object with team details.

    • buildCompareTeamResponse

      public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> buildCompareTeamResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int idTeam1, int idTeam2, int season)
      Builds a response containing a comparison of two NBA teams, including team statistics, last games, and head-to-head performance.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The token request containing the user's authentication token.
      idTeam1 - The unique identifier of the first team.
      idTeam2 - The unique identifier of the second team.
      season - The season for which the comparison is requested.
      Returns:
      A CompareTeamsResponse object with team comparison details.

    • buildStandingsResponse

      public StandingsResponse buildStandingsResponse(TokenRequest tokenRequest, int season)
      Builds a response containing NBA team standings for a specific season, including information about wins, losses, and statistical averages.
      Parameters:
      tokenRequest - The token request containing the user's authentication token.
      season - The season for which standings are requested.
      Returns:
      A StandingsResponse object with team standings.
